General.Name: The PMI Group Inc
General.Description: The PMI Group, Inc., through its subsidiary, PMI Mortgage Insurance Co., provides mortgage insurance to lenders and other financial entities in the United States and internationally. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Walnut Creek, California.
General.Address: 3003 Oak Road, Walnut Creek, CA, United States, 94597
